trans-unit.source: Describes how abstract content is mapped into a concrete format.
trans-unit.target: 추상 콘텐츠 구체적인 형식으로 매핑되는 방법을 설명 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This abstract class forms the base class for the following classes: - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding>
trans-unit.target: 다음 클래스에 대 한 기본 클래스를 형성 하는이 추상 클래스:- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding></xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> of which the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> is a member.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref> 는 현재 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"> </xref> 구성원임을 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each of the classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding> class corresponds to a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) element (`<input>`, `<output>` or `<fault>`) enclosed by the `<operation>` element, which is in turn enclosed by the `<binding>` element.
trans-unit.target: 각각의 클래스에서 파생 된는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding>클래스 요소에 해당 하는 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 () (`<input>`, `<output>` 또는 `<fault>`)로 묶인는 `<operation>` 묶여으로 하는 요소를는 `<binding>` 요소.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> class corresponds to that `<operation>` element in the WSDL document.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: WSDL에 대 한 자세한 내용은 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/에 사양을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> of which the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> is a member.
